brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS-233 SR and Venlafaxine ER in Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
brief_summary: To compare the antidepressant efficacy and safety of DVS-233 SR versus placebo in adult outpatients with MDD.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Outpatients. - Sexually active individuals participating in the study must use a medically acceptable form of contraception during the study and for at least 15 days after the last dose of test article - Subjects must have a primary diagnosis of major depressive disorder Exclusion Criteria: - Treatment with DVS-233 SR at any time in the past - Treatment with venlafaxine (immediate release [IR] or ER) within 90 days of study day 1 - Known hypersensitivity to venlafaxine (IR or ER)
